queries.description: Fetch catalog with available dimensions and measures
queries.query: query CatalogDimensions($orgId: String!) { catalog(orgId: $orgId) { dimensions { name description } measures { name description } limits { maxDays maxBuckets maxTopN } } }

queries.description: Fetch distinct team values for catalog
queries.query: query TeamValues($orgId: String!) { catalog(orgId: $orgId, dimension: TEAM) { values { value count } } }

queries.description: Fetch distinct repo values for catalog
queries.query: query RepoValues($orgId: String!) { catalog(orgId: $orgId, dimension: REPO) { values { value count } } }

queries.description: Fetch distinct author values for catalog
queries.query: query AuthorValues($orgId: String!) { catalog(orgId: $orgId, dimension: AUTHOR) { values { value count } } }

queries.description: Fetch distinct theme values for catalog
queries.query: query ThemeValues($orgId: String!) { catalog(orgId: $orgId, dimension: THEME) { values { value count } } }

queries.description: Fetch theme and subcategory breakdowns for Investment view
queries.query: query InvestmentBreakdown($orgId: String!, $batch: AnalyticsRequestInput!) { analytics(orgId: $orgId, batch: $batch) { breakdowns { dimension measure items { key value } } } }

queries.description: Fetch Sankey flow data for Investment view
queries.query: query InvestmentSankey($orgId: String!, $batch: AnalyticsRequestInput!) { analytics(orgId: $orgId, batch: $batch) { sankey { nodes { id label dimension value } edges { source target value } coverage { teamCoverage repoCoverage } } } }

query InvestmentFull($orgId: String!, $batch: AnalyticsRequestInput!) { analytics(orgId: $orgId, batch: $batch) { breakdowns { dimension measure items { key value } } sankey { nodes { id label dimension value } edges { source target value } coverage { teamCoverage repoCoverage } } } }
query TimeseriesWeekly($orgId: String!, $batch: AnalyticsRequestInput!) { analytics(orgId: $orgId, batch: $batch) { timeseries { dimension dimensionValue measure buckets { date value } } } }

queries.description: Fetch team-scoped analytics with breakdowns and timeseries
queries.query: query TeamAnalyticsBundle($orgId: String!, $batch: AnalyticsRequestInput!) { analytics(orgId: $orgId, batch: $batch) { timeseries { dimension dimensionValue measure buckets { date value } } breakdowns { dimension measure items { key value } } } }

queries.description: Fetch repo-scoped analytics with breakdowns and timeseries
queries.query: query RepoAnalyticsBundle($orgId: String!, $batch: AnalyticsRequestInput!) { analytics(orgId: $orgId, batch: $batch) { timeseries { dimension dimensionValue measure buckets { date value } } breakdowns { dimension measure items { key value } } } }
query BreakdownTop10($orgId: String!, $batch: AnalyticsRequestInput!) { analytics(orgId: $orgId, batch: $batch) { breakdowns { dimension measure items { key value } } } }

query SankeyFlow($orgId: String!, $batch: AnalyticsRequestInput!) { analytics(orgId: $orgId, batch: $batch) { sankey { nodes { id label dimension value } edges { source target value } coverage { teamCoverage repoCoverage } } } }
